summary: H.R. 5282, the Reauthorizing Support and Treatment for Officers in Crisis Act of 2025, aims to reauthorize grants for law enforcement officers and their families. The bill amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968, specifically section 1001(a)(21), to extend funding from the years 2025 through 2029. This legislation focuses on providing continued support and resources to address the challenges faced by law enforcement.
